channel.title: Vps
channel.description: I need help putting my server on a vps host. Could someone with team viewer help me? or someone who has clear instructions? If you need more info ask plz :D

item.description:
@penguinimp wrote:

[quote=“3lv3n snip3r, post:5, topic:485743”][quote author=jamie233 link=topic=603976.msg4223714#msg4223714 date=1360903243]
how do i send it to my vps to download I have the link and the client in a .zip but idk how to send it over to my Vps
[/quote]
Major ass facepalm…[/quote]
I Lol’d so Soo hard.

item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You’re just in luck team viewer allows you to send files from one host to another!

If you have team viewer on your vps then you can just use the file transfer option, it’s right below the remote connect check box.

Read full topic

item.title: Vps
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“jamie233, post:3, topic:485743”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=603976.msg4223696#msg4223696 date=1360902764]

I need help putting my server on a vps host. Could someone with team viewer help me? or someone who has clear instructions?
If you need more info ask plz

The easiest method is send it to a upload site (like uppit or media fire) in a .zip and copy the link over. then send it to your vps and download.
[/quote]
how do i send it to my vps to download I have the link and the client in a .zip but idk how to send it over to my Vps[/quote]
Copy the link
Open your VPS in Remote Desktop Connection
Paste in browser.

Read full topic
